Package org.apache.hama.monitor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Federator.Collector
    Collect GroomServer information from repository.
    Federator.CollectorHandler
    Purpose to handle the result returned by Collector.
    Monitor.Result
    An interface holds the result executed by a task.
    MonitorListener
    MonitorListener passes the result for notification.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configurator
    Configurator loads and configure jar files.
    Federator  
    Federator.Act
    A token binds collector and handler together.
    Metric<T>  
    MetricsRecord
    Represents a record containing multiple metrics.
    MetricsTag
    Information that classifies MetricsRecord.
    Monitor
    Monitor daemon performs tasks in order to monitor GroomServer's status.
    Monitor.Task
    Monitor class setup task with results and then task worker runs the task.
    Monitor.ZKHandler  
    ZKCollector
    Fire a action to harvest metrics from ZooKeeper.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Monitor.Destination
    Destination tells Publisher where to publish the result.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Monitor.TaskException
    When executing task goes worng, TaskException is thrown.
